summary: Two outlaws, Rio and Esqueda, raised together as stepbrothers, have a showdown over the issue of whether to evict new settlers from their territory.
cast: Robert Taylor|Ava Gardner|Howard Keel|Anthony Quinn|Kurt Kasznar|Ted de Corsia|Charlita|Jack Elam|Walter Baldwin|Joe Dominguez|Frank McGrath|Charles Stevens|Rex Lease|Tom Greenway|Stanley Andrews|Monte Blue|Chet Brandenburg|Harry Brown|Archie Butler|John Call|Gene Coogan|Italia DeNubila|Bobby Diamond|Kay English|Paul Fierro|Jimmie Fox|Frank Hagney|James Harrison|Al Haskell|Jim Hayward|Percy Helton|Jack Hendricks|Stuart Holmes|Norman Leavitt|Philo McCullough|Lew Morphy|Charles Morton|Movita|Joe Ploski|Joey Ray|Pedro Regas|Almira Sessions|Clint Sharp|Robert R. Stephenson|Jack Tornek|Philip Van Zandt|Emmett Vogan|George W. Watkins|Wilson Wood
title: Una vida por otra
